pages.title: Bescon Consulting Engineers Pte - About Us
pages.clean_text: Bescon Consulting Engineers Pte - About Us Bescon Consulting Engineers Pte (BESCON) is an award winning Professional Mechanical and Electrical (M&E) Engineering Consultancy and Project Management firm. We provide a full range of consulting services including feasibility studies, conceptual & final design and construction management services. Company Profile Since its founding in 1972, our practice has grown to encompass a wide range of projects. These range from residential, recreational, institutional, commercial and industrial to infrastructure projects for clients both locally and regionally. With a full complement of professional staff from the various engineering disciplines, clients can be assured of the most comprehensive and highest standard of professional services. Our overseas associates include P.T. Morimura and Associates of Japan and BES Perunding of Malaysia. This extensive pool of talent can be assembled into integrated project teams to develop comprehensive and cost-effective approaches to our clients� needs. BESCON's track record is proven and evident in the end result: building services with innovative design solutions that meets and often exceeds clients� expectation for performance. The professionalism of our service is evident in our dedication, conduct and undertaking of every project. It is through our personalised service and attention that BESCON is the quality firm it is today. Our Mission Our mission is to add value to our clients' businesses by providing innovative, quality and cost-effective expertise in Professional Engineering Consultancy Services. We are committed to performing our services to the highest professional standard. BESCON aims to achieve excellence and meet our client's total satisfaction in the provision of Professional Mechanical and Electrical Consultancy Services. Our Philosophy The continual exploration of Engineering ideas and skill to achieve the most value added solution ranks high on our priority. We are constantly seeking out the latest technological advancement, paying close attention to clients' requirements, aesthetics, functionality and economic elements of projects. We take the extra effort to think from our clients' perspective - understanding their needs and tailoring our solutions to meet those needs. Our commitment to this philosophy has resulted in many long-standing partnerships, where BESCON plays a continual role in the successful development of our clients' businesses and strategies. With most of our projects coming from existing clients, it is clear that this approach is the formula for our reputable standing. BESCON is committed to a high standard of integrity, quality and professionalism. Home | Disclaimer | Site Map COPYRIGHT, BESCON CONSULTING ENGINEERS PTE

pages.title: Bescon Consulting Engineers Pte - Career with Us
pages.clean_text: Bescon Consulting Engineers Pte - Career with Us We are constantly looking for talented individuals to join our team. If you think you have the right qualities we are looking for, please email your resume to hr@bescon.com.sg M & E Engineers Degree in Mechanical/Electrical/Building Services Engineering. Min. 3 years relevant experience in the design, supervision and management of Building Services Installation. Be part of our team M & E Assistant Engineers Diploma in the relevant discipline. Min. 3 years relevant experience. M & E Designers Electrical/Air-conditioning/Piped Services/Fire Protection. Diploma/ITE/GCE O' Levels. Min. 3 years relevant experience. M & E Draftspersons Diploma/ITE/GCE O' Levels. Min. 2 years relevant experience. Trainee Draftspersons No experience required. Training in AutoCAD will be provided. System Engineer Possess basic system and network troubleshooting skills. Min. 2 years relevant experience. Home | Disclaimer | Site Map COPYRIGHT, BESCON CONSULTING ENGINEERS PTE

The information contained in the material in this Website is only for information purposes. All information is provided "as is" and Bescon Consulting Engineers Pte assumes no responsibility for the accuracy of the information or materials. The material on this Website does not constitute advice and you should not rely on any material in this Website to make any decision or take any action. The pages contained in this Website may contain technical inaccuracies and typographical errors. The information in these pages may be updated from time to time and may at times be out of date. We accept no responsibility for keeping the information in these pages up to date or liability for any failure to do so. This Website contains links to other websites which are not under the control of and are not maintained by Bescon Consulting Engineers Pte. Bescon Consulting Engineers Pte is not responsible for the content of those sites. Bescon Consulting Engineers Pte provides these links for your convenience only but does not necessarily endorse the material on these sites. The site location display in the Location Map View is only a APPROXIMATE representation of the sites actual location and is for reference purposes only. Use beyond this intended purpose or any reliance on the information contained herein is at the user's own risk. request_payload.name: BESCON1
request_payload.opening_text: Welcome to the Q & A session on BESCON1
request_payload.prompt:
## PERSONA / ROLE
You are a passionate teacher acting as a mediator for learners.
Scope & safety:
Keep the conversation focused exclusively on bescon and related information only.
If asked about any other topic, reply with exactly:
"Let us focus only on bescon only"
Style & tone:
Use short replies: 1–3 concise sentences or a short paragraph.
Be clear, friendly, and encouraging.

## COMPANY
Company: BESCON1
Website: https://www.bescon.com.sg/

Use the following scraped material as the knowledge base. Cite the source URL when helpful.

(No scraped content was available.)
